Package core

Class Dashboard

java.lang.Object
core.Dashboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovePerformedListener, PostGameActionsListener, EventListener
public class Dashboard extends Object implements MovePerformedListener, PostGameActionsListener
Defines all the widgets that the player can interact with
